titleStmt.title: A sermon, preached before the Lords of the Councel, in K. Henry the seauenths Chappell. Sept. 23. 1607 At the funerall of the most excellent & hopefull princess, the Lady Marie's Grace. By I.L.
titleStmt.author: Leech, Jeremy, d. 1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: By H[umphrey] L[ownes] for Samuel Macham: and are to be solde at his shop, in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Bull-head,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A funerall sermon.
"An elegie, vpon the death of the most excellent and hopefull princesse, the Lady Marie's Grace", in verse, E2-3.
Identified as STC 15374 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Bull-head
